name: WooCommerce + Masterway
author: Masterway

sections.description:
The Masterway Extension for WooCommerce allows you to invoice your clients via Masterway.

Main features:
– Choose to generate the documents you need: invoice, simplified invoice or proforma invoice (draft).
– Portuguese VAT Region configuration.
– Configure the serie you want to generate your invoices.
sections.installation:
1. Place ‘woo-masterway’ folder in your plugins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. Visit the Masterway settings under the WooCommerce menu and configure the required settings.
